question: I have had a constant runny nose (12months) which I had assumed was an allergic thing but recently i have noticed that my hearing is suffering and I have been experiencing mild ear pain and an intermittent sore throat. I have alway been a bit nasaly but things seem to be connected.   I am constantly tired but I know I don't have a cold or flue.  Is this an infection, diabetes or what?Gary
title: nasal congestion and ear problems
